1 package io.redgreen.timelapse.git.model
2
3 class PatchFile(private val unifiedPatch: String) {
4   enum class Side {
5     A, B
6   }
7
8   companion object {
9     private const val CHAR_NEWLINE = "\n"
10     private const val CHAR_SPACE = " "
11     private const val CHAR_PLUS = "+"
12     private const val CHAR_MINUS = "-"
13     private const val CHAR_FORWARD_SLASH = "\\"
14     private const val HUNK_HEADER_PREFIX = "@@"
15     private const val END_OF_PATCH = "-- "
16
17     private const val INDEX_SIDE_A = 1
18     private const val INDEX_SIDE_B = 2
19
20     fun from(unifiedPatch: String): PatchFile =
21       PatchFile(unifiedPatch)
22   }
23
24   fun affectedLineNumbers(side: Side): List<Int> {
25     val lines = unifiedPatch.split(CHAR_NEWLINE)
26
27     val unifiedDiffHeaders = lines.filter { it.startsWith(HUNK_HEADER_PREFIX) }
28     val hunkHeaders = unifiedDiffHeaders
29       .map { diffHeader -> hunkHeader(diffHeader, side) }
      .map { it.split(CHAR_SPACE) }
      .map {
        val indexSide = if (side == Side.A) INDEX_SIDE_A else INDEX_SIDE_B
        hunkHeader(it, indexSide)
      }
30
31     val hunkLinesList = unifiedDiffHeaders.mapIndexed { index, unifiedDiffHeader ->
32       val unifiedDiffHeaderIndex = lines.indexOf(unifiedDiffHeader)
33       val nextUnifiedDiffHeaderIndex = if (index == unifiedDiffHeaders.lastIndex) {
34         lines.lastIndex
35       } else {
36         lines.indexOf(unifiedDiffHeaders[index + 1]) - 1
37       }
38       lines.subList(unifiedDiffHeaderIndex + 1, nextUnifiedDiffHeaderIndex)
39     }
40
41     val getAffectedLinesFunction = if (side == Side.A) ::affectedLinesForA else ::affectedLinesForB
42
43     return hunkHeaders
44       .zip(hunkLinesList, getAffectedLinesFunction)
45       .flatten()
46   }
47
48   private fun affectedLinesForA(
49     hunkHeader: HunkHeader,
50     hunkLines: List<String>
51   ): List<Int> {
52     return affectedLines(hunkLines, hunkHeader, CHAR_PLUS) { it.startsWith(CHAR_MINUS) && it != END_OF_PATCH }
53   }
54
55   private fun affectedLinesForB(
56     hunkHeader: HunkHeader,
57     hunkLines: List<String>
58   ): List<Int> {
59     return affectedLines(hunkLines, hunkHeader, CHAR_MINUS) { it.startsWith(CHAR_PLUS) }
60   }
61
62   private fun affectedLines(
63     hunkLines: List<String>,
64     hunkHeader: HunkHeader,
65     modificationChar: String,
66     modificationCheck: (line: String) -> Boolean
67   ): List<Int> {
68     val affectedLineNumbers = mutableListOf<Int>()
69     var offset = 0
70     hunkLines.foldIndexed(affectedLineNumbers) { index, lineNumbersAccumulator, line ->
71       if (line.startsWith(modificationChar) || line.startsWith(CHAR_FORWARD_SLASH)) {
72         offset--
73       } else if (modificationCheck(line)) {
74         lineNumbersAccumulator.add(offset + index + hunkHeader.startLine)
75       }
76       lineNumbersAccumulator
77     }
78     return affectedLineNumbers.toList()
79   }
80
81   private fun hunkHeader(
82     diffHeader: String,
83     side: Side
84   ): HunkHeader {
85     val diffHeaderParts = diffHeader.split(CHAR_SPACE)
86     val indexSide = if (side == Side.A) INDEX_SIDE_A else INDEX_SIDE_B
87     return HunkHeader.from(diffHeaderParts[indexSide])
88   }
​
  private fun hunkHeader(headerParts: List<String>, sideIndex: Int): HunkHeader =
    HunkHeader.from(headerParts[sideIndex])
89 }
90
